subject: Fishing, Sport
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bogdan’s reels were so coveted that anglers were willing to spend years on a waiting list to buy them and then to pay far more than they would have for reels of only ordinary excellence.
snippet: Mr. Bogdan’s reels were so coveted that anglers were willing to spend years on a waiting list to buy them and then to pay far more than they would have for reels of only ordinary excellence.
